message.content:
cs.CR, cs.DC, cs.NI, cs.DS, cs.SI. 

The paper discusses a security issue in Ethereum, specifically selfish mining, which falls under the category of computer security (cs.CR). The paper also involves analyzing the difficulty adjustment formula and computing profitabilities, which could fall under distributed computing (cs.DC) and networking and internet architecture (cs.NI). The use of combinatorics analysis suggests a possible category of data structures and algorithms (cs.DS), and the study of incentives and strategies could also fall under social and information networks (cs.SI).
